body_html:
@apaszke do we want to remove that check with strict=False?

In its current state you can delete keys from a loaded state dict and then load params in (i.e. for fine-tuning)

But I guess you may also want to define a new model (with a few extra layers) and then just transfer over any common layers? Yeah ok, I've convinced myself whilst writing this out - 1 sec I'll push an update
